entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Duncan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:12 a.m. PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

Observed at: North Cowichan 2:00 PM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 13.
entry.summary: Rain ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia early this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
